header.para:
Alarm ListPlease change this whole page content to follow
"PMC Operator Alarm List" page from V180I-I1E-XD Slim3n Instruction Manual (EN) chapter 5 Section 19

body.para: User messages are incorporated in the system, to give a general status of the machine conditions during the operation. However, it is possible that there is a machine status which is not mentioned in this chapter. In that condition, systematic check and proper care must be taken to troubleshoot the machine.

table.style: width:auto; cell-padding:4px; cell-spacing:0px; page-break-inside:auto; border-width:0px; border-spacing:0px; border-collapse:collapse; cell-border-width:1px; border-color:#000000; border-style:solid; background-color:none; head-row-background-color:none; alt-row-background-color:none;

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: EMERGENCY STOP MODE IS ACTIVE.(*EMI IS OFF) (RELEASE E-STOP AND PRESS POWER ON BUTTON)
Release emergency stop button and press NC ON [PS1] button.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: OVER TRAVEL LIMIT SWITCH OF FEED AXIS IS HIT.
(OR MEASURING PROBE TOUCHES SOMETHING) [*ESP SIGNAL IS OFF] OR
OT2X (X8.5) or OT2Y (X8.6) or OT2Z (X8.7) is hit. Healthy condition is these signals must be OFF or
Probe status (MSSW) from measuring probe is ON during non-measurement mode (NMSMD)(Y5.0)=ON
If axis is in OT zone, then move the respective axis out of OT zone by moving axis in opposite direction. Else
Check OT2X (X8.5) or OT2Y (X8.6) or OT2Z (X8.7) must be OFF.
Check whether hardware circuit for OT2X or OT2Y or OT2Z are OK.
During non measurement mode (NMSMD)(Y5.0)=ON make sure not to do measurement. Or (MSSW) status must be OFF.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: ATC TIME OVER. RESET CYCLE BY ALARM RESET BUTTON
ATC could not complete operation within specified time. The reason could be some of the signals don’t operate normally.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: When this alarm happens, check if any other alarm exists along with this message and solve it. Else note the situation (machine condition, block at which program stopped, machine position screen with distance to go page photo) and inform such details to MAKINO customer service.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Reset cycle by ALARM RESET button

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: ATC MAGAZINE DATA ERROR! PLEASE SET MAGAZINE TYPE DATA.
Related parameter: D302 (Refer PMC parameter list for detail or consult Makino).
Set parameter based on magazine type.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: FIXTURE IS NOT AT HOME POSITION SO OPERATION IN AUTO MODE CAN NOT BE STARTED.
For auto cycle start with auto door fixture must be in unclamped.
Fixture unclamp lamp LHY1UC [Y8.1] must light up.
Unclamp fixture and check fixture unclamp lamp LHY1UC [Y8.1] light up.

para.style: text-align:center; page-break-before:always;

table.style: width:auto; cell-padding:4px; cell-spacing:0px; page-break-inside:auto; border-width:0px; border-spacing:0px; border-collapse:collapse; cell-border-width:1px; border-color:#000000; border-style:solid; background-color:none; head-row-background-color:none; alt-row-background-color:none;

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: FRONT DOOR DOES NOT SATISFY CONDITION TO START AUTO CYCLE.
Manual door: Front door must be closed (LS912) must be ON
Auto single door: Front door must be open. SL1001=ON; SL1002=OFF; LS2311=OFF; LS2312=ON;
Auto double door: Front door must be open. SL1001=ON; SL1002=OFF; LS2311=ON; LS2312=ON; LS912=OFF;
Stocker side auto door must be open. SL1001=ON; SL1002=OFF; LS2312L=ON; LS2312R=ON; LS966=OFF;

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: X-Axis hit hard over travel limit switch.
X-Axis over travel limit switch OT2X is ON.
Move the axis out of over travel zone in reverse direction and check OT2X signal must be OFF.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Y-Axis hit hard over travel limit switch.
Y-Axis hard over travel limit switch OT2Y is ON.
Move the axis out of over travel zone in reverse direction and check OT2Y signal must be OFF

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Z-Axis hit hard over travel limit switch.
Z-Axis hard over travel limit switch OT2Z is ON.
Move the axis out of over travel zone in reverse direction and check OT2Z signal must be OFF.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: ATC was not standby (Ready) during cycle start.
Feed axis must not be in ATC zone (Y-Axis machine position must be > -150.0)
ATC shutter must be closed. (ATC magazine position should be 0 Degree)

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: CYCLE START ERROR. REFERENCE POINT IS NOT ESTABLISHED.
Reference point of axis not established. Cycle start is inhibited.
Make sure reference point of all axis is established.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: PROGRAM NUMBER TO BE SEARCHED EXCEEDS 9999. CHECK PMC PARAMETER SETTING.
Program number in PMC parameter for program search exceeds 9999.
Check related PMC parameter setting value falls within range.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:48px left,96px left,144px left,192px left,240px left,288px left,336px left,384px left,432px left,480px left,528px left,576px left ;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:48px left,96px left,144px left,192px left,240px left,288px left,336px left,384px left,432px left,480px left,528px left,576px left ;
para.text: External data input from PMC to CNC process failed.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Check if corresponding NC alarm is generated along with this alarm. If so take corrective action after referring Fanuc maintenance manual.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: CNC ALARM HAS OCCURRED DURING PROGRAM SEARCH.PROGRAM TO BE SEARCHED MAY NOT EXIST IN MEMORY.
The search program entered in related PMC parameter may not exist in CNC memory.
Check the related PMC parameter for program number search for different function's and CNC memory for programs registered.

para.style: text-align:center; page-break-before:always;

table.style: width:auto; cell-padding:4px; cell-spacing:0px; page-break-inside:auto; border-width:0px; border-spacing:0px; border-collapse:collapse; cell-border-width:1px; border-color:#000000; border-style:solid; background-color:none; head-row-background-color:none; alt-row-background-color:none;

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: ATC IS NOT IN STAND-BY POSITION.
ATC was not standby (Ready) during cycle start.
Feed axis must not be in ATC zone (Y-Axis machine position must be > -150.0)
ATC shutter must be closed. (ATC magazine position should be 0 Degree)

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: PALLET CHANGER IS NOT IN HOME POSITION. (NOT STAND-BY)
Pallet changer not at home during cycle start process.
Clockwise SL101B=ON; SL101A=OFF; LS102=OFF; LS103=ON; or
Counter clockwise SL101B=OFF; SL101A=ON; LS102=ON; LS103=OFF;
and APC must be down SL100A=ON; LS100=ON;
Check if APC is at home position and check the signal status match as mentioned above.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Spindle tool is not clamped status during auto start process.
Spindle clamp status SL01=ON; LS00=ON; LS01=OFF
Confirm spindle tool clamp and check signal status as above.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Operator door not closed during auto start process.
Standard machine front door close status:
Auto single door: SL1001=OFF; SL1002=ON; LS2311=ON; LS2312=OFF;
Auto double door: SL1001=OFF; SL1002=ON; LS2311=OFF; LS2312=OFF; LS912=ON;
APC machine operator door close status:
Confirm operator door is closed and check signal status as above.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: MACHINE LOCK, Z-AXIS NEGLECT OR AUX. FUNCTION LOCK IS ACTIVATED.
Machine lock, Z-Axis neglect, auxiliary function lock is active during auto start.
Check in custom "Machine Status Screen" whether any of these functions is active. Deactivate these functions before auto cycle start.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Coolant mode is OFF status during auto cycle start.
Check if coolant was in pause status by pressing coolant OFF button on main operation panel. Turn OFF pause state by pressing coolant ON button and check coolant ON button lamp is lit.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: ATC operation mode is manual during auto start.
Exit ATC maintenance mode. If ATC shutter is open then close the ATC shutter by commanding M555 in MDI mode.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Dry run is active during auto start.
Check in custom "Machine Status Screen" whether DRY RUN is active. Deactivate dry run mode before auto cycle start.

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-before:always; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

table.style: width:auto; cell-padding:4px; cell-spacing:0px; page-break-inside:auto; border-width:0px; border-spacing:0px; border-collapse:collapse; cell-border-width:1px; border-color:#000000; border-style:solid; background-color:none; head-row-background-color:none; alt-row-background-color:none;

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:48px left,96px left,144px left,192px left,240px left,288px left,336px left,384px left,432px left,480px left,528px left,576px left ;
para.text: FEED AXIS IS NOT AT AUTO START POSITION AT CYCLE START.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:48px left,96px left,144px left,192px left,240px left,288px left,336px left,384px left,432px left,480px left,528px left,576px left ;
para.text: Feed axis is not at auto start position during auto start.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:48px left,96px left,144px left,192px left,240px left,288px left,336px left,384px left,432px left,480px left,528px left,576px left ;
para.text: X Home F70.0; Y Home F70.1; Z Home F70.2; A RWH Home F70.3 (with A RWH option); B RWH Home F70.4 (with B RWH option) must be ON '1'.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Return feed axis to home position before auto start.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: ERROR HAS OCCURRED DURING EXECUTION OF CNC WINDOW READ/WRITE.
Error occurred during CNC window read/write by PMC software.
Note down during which command this error occurred. Inform this condition to Makino Service.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:1px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Non existing M-Code is been commanded.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Multiple M-Codes that cannot be used at the same time are commanded.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Fail to read the macro variable in M466. (Reading stop position for the angle specific spindle orientation.)
The data that is specified by the macro variable must be from 0.0000001 to 99999999.
Check the value of macro variable #100 and correct part program.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: MUST NOT BE SPECIFIED TOGETHER WITH ANOTHER M-CODE.
M-Code which must be used alone has been commanded together with other M-Code at the same block.
Correct part program so that this M-Code is alone.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: M, S or T command cannot be completed due to a fault.
Push NC reset key in order to cancel.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: M-Code which requires S-Code at the same block as an augment was commanded without S-Code.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: PALLET LOAD CHECK(M84,M95) ALARM. CHECK TABLE PALLET NUMBER.
Pallet position is not correct when M84 or M95 commanded.
Check pallet changer arm position and condition.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: TOOL CALLED BY T-CODE IS ABSENT STATUS.
The tool specified by T-Code is absent. (The tool is out of the tool magazine.)
This message appears if the tool data which has absent mark is called.
Check the tool status. And change the tool or correct the tool status.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: TOOL CALLED BY T-CODE IS ALARM STATUS. NO SPARE TOOL SET OR ALL SPARE TOOLS IN ALARM STATUS.
The tool specified by T-Code is alarm status.
This message appears if the tool data that has alarm mark is called.
Check the tool status. And change the tool or correct the tool status.

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-before:always; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: MAINTENANCE MODE IS ACTIVATED OR ATC UNIT IS REMOVED BY PMC PARAMETER.
Maintenance mode is activated or ATC is neglected by parameter.
Maintenance mode is activated or ATC unit is neglected by the PMC parameter: ATCNON [K61.4]=0
Switch OFF the maintenance mode. Check the PMC parameter:K61.4

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: TOOL CALLED BY T-CODE DOES NOT EXIST IN TOOL DATABASE.
The tool that was called by T-Code is not found in the tool database.
Confirm the tool database on the Tool Data Screen.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: During striker job light curtain was interrupted.
Check light curtain is operating properly.
Do not block light curtain during cycle start or door close or during pallet changing / fixture clamping (in machines without door).

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:48px left,96px left,144px left,192px left,240px left,288px left,336px left,384px left,432px left,480px left,528px left,576px left ;
para.text: PART MAY NOT HAVE BEEN SET UP. SEAT CHECK SENSOR DID NOT TURN OFF SINCE LAST CYCLE COMPLETION.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:48px left,96px left,144px left,192px left,240px left,288px left,336px left,384px left,432px left,480px left,528px left,576px left ;
para.text: Machined part has not been unloaded and restarted auto cycle. This is to prevent re-machining of finished part.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:48px left,96px left,144px left,192px left,240px left,288px left,336px left,384px left,432px left,480px left,528px left,576px left ;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:48px left,96px left,144px left,192px left,240px left,288px left,336px left,384px left,432px left,480px left,528px left,576px left ;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Check part seating sensor (when unload the part, part seating sensor should be OFF).

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: PART MAY NOT HAVE BEEN SET UP. SAFETY LIGHT CURTAIN HAS NEVER BEEN INTERRUPTED SINCE LAST CYCLE COMPLETION. SET UP PART OR CHECK LIGHT CURTAIN.
After previous part machining complete auto cycle start was triggered without interrupting light curtain. This is to prevent re-machining of finished part.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: APC IS NOT IN STANDBY POSITION.
Pallet changer not at home during cycle start process.
Clockwise SL101B=ON; SL101A=OFF; LS102=OFF; LS103=ON; or
Counter clockwise SL101B=OFF; SL101A=ON; LS102=ON; LS103=OFF;
and APC must be down SL100A=ON; LS100=ON;
Check if APC is at home position and check the signal status match as mentioned above.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: ATC IS NOT IN STANDBY POSITION.
ATC was not standby (Ready) during spindle start / spindle orient / rigid tap command.
Feed axis must not be in ATC zone (Y-Axis machine position must be > -150.0)
ATC shutter must be closed. (ATC magazine position should be 0 Degree)

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-before:always; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

table.style: width:auto; cell-padding:4px; cell-spacing:0px; page-break-inside:auto; border-width:0px; border-spacing:0px; border-collapse:collapse; cell-border-width:1px; border-color:#000000; border-style:solid; background-color:none; head-row-background-color:none; alt-row-background-color:none;

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: When spindle start status is checked by M302 command, spindle does not start or spindle job does not complete within regulated time (10sec).
In case of forward rotation SFRA [G70.5]=1,
In case of reverse rotation SRVA [G70.4]=1

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: CLAMPING OF SPINDLE TOOL IS NOT COMPLETED IN SPECIFIED TIME.
Spindle tool clamping motion does not complete in regulated time.
Check solenoid valve, limit switch and mechanism that are related to spindle tool clamping.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: UNCLAMPING OF SPINDLE TOOL IS NOT COMPLETED IN SPECIFIED TIME.
Spindle tool unclamping motion does not complete in regulated time.
Spindle tool unclamping status LS00=0, LS01=1, SL01=1
Check solenoid valve, limit switch and mechanism that are related to spindle tool clamping.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: CALCULATION ERROR HAS OCCURRED IN SPINDLE SPEED PROCESSING.
Calculation error has occurred in conversion spindle speed command into motor speed.
Check that speed command is correct.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: SPINDLE COOLER MOTOR THERMAL ALARM. TH5/TH5A=1.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Remove the cause of the trip and reset the thermal switch.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: CALCULATION ERROR HAS OCCURRED IN ORIENTATION ANGLE PROCESSING.
Calculation error has occurred in the spindle multi-angle orientation.
Calculation error is occurred when M318, M330 command.
Check whether specified angle is within the range.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Spindle cannot turn because spindle is not tool clamp status. Info:

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Spindle tool clamp status⇒ LS00=1, LS01=0, SL01=0.

para.text: Spindle cannot turn because operator door (side door) or front door is not closing.
Standard machine front door close status:
Auto single door: SL1001=OFF; SL1002=ON; LS2311=ON; LS2312=OFF;
Auto double door: SL1001=OFF; SL1002=ON; LS2311=OFF; LS2312=OFF; LS912=ON;
APC machine operator door close status:

para.text: SPINDLE START IS NOT COMPLETED IN SPECIFIED TIME.
Spindle starting is not completed within 10 seconds.
In case of forward rotation: SFRA [G70.5]=1,
In case of reverse rotation: SRVA [G70.4]=1
Check spindle drive amplifier and CNC parameter that is related to spindle.

para.text: CONDITION THAT SPINDLE CAN ROTATE WAS MISSING WHILE SPINDLE IS RUNNING. REASON: [I230,D1368]
Condition that allows spindle rotating has been lost during spindle rotating.
Refer explanation of message number A064.
- Pallet changer is not at home (stand by)
Refer explanation of message number A056
- Machine is not in maintenance mode.
- Spindle lubrication oil temperature controller is working:
Refer explanation of message number A067.
- Operator (side) door and front door are closing:
Refer explanation of message number A066.
Refer explanation of message number A057
The cause remains in the address of D1368.
Bit 4 The automatic tool changer unit became not normal (standby).
Bit 5 The machining area door opened.
Bit 6 The alarm was generated by the spindle amplifier unit.
Bit 7 The spindle temperature controller is abnormal.
Please execute the check and the repair to meet the above-mentioned requirement

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

para.text: SWITCHING OF SPINDLE MOTOR WINDINGS HAS NOT BEEN DONE PROPERLY,SO SPINDLE CAN NOT TURN.(Related signal: RCH1, RCH2)CHECK CONTACTOR TO SWITCH WINDINGS.
Spindle cannot turn because switching of spindle motor windings has not been done properly.
Proper status of high speed windings:
RCHP=0, RCH1=0, RCH2=1, RSLA[G71.6]=0, RCHA [G71.7]=0, RCHPA [F46.2]=0, RCFNA[F46.3]=0
Proper status of low speed windings:
RCHP=1, RCH1=1, RCH2=0, RSLA[G71.6]=1, RCHA [G71.7]=1, RCHPA [F46.2]=1, RCFNA[F46.3]=1
Check contactor of spindle motor windings.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

para.text: SWITCHING OF SPINDLE MOTOR WINDINGS DID NOT COMPLETE WITHIN 10 SECONDS. (Related signal: RCH1, RCH2) CHECK CONTACTOR TO SWITCH WINDINGS.
Switching of spindle motor windings did not complete within 10 seconds.
Proper status of high speed windings:
RCHP=0, RCH1=0, RCH2=1, RSLA [G71.6]=0, RCHA [G71.7]=0, RCHPA [F46.2]=0, RCFNA[F46.3]=0
Proper status of low speed windings:
RCHP=1, RCH1=1, RCH2=0, RSLA[G71.6]=1, RCHA [G71.7]=1, RCHPA [F46.2]=1, RCFNA[F46.3]=1
Check contactor of spindle motor windings.

para.text: PALLET CHANGER IS NOT IN STAND-BY POSITION.
Pallet changer not at home during cycle start process.
Clockwise SL101B=ON; SL101A=OFF; LS102=OFF; LS103=ON; or
Counter clockwise SL101B=OFF; SL101A=ON; LS102=ON; LS103=OFF;
and APC must be down SL100A=ON; LS100=ON;
Check if APC is at home position and check the signal status match as mentioned above.

para.text: PROGRAM TOOL IS PROHIBITED OR ALARM STATUS.
Tool that was commanded is alarm status.
Check and solve the alarm generated on the tool before commanding the tool

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

para.text: TOOL CHANGE FOR RETURN TOOL IS PROHIBITED.
Return tool that was commanded is alarm status.
Check and solve the alarm generated on the return tool before commanding the tool.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

para.text: TOOL CLAMPING CYL NEUTRAL TIME OUT.
Tool seating signal LS601 is not confirmed while clamping neutral pressure process.
Check for any chip on tool or tool seating LS601 signal status must be 1.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

para.text: ATC MAGAZINE DOOR IS NOT CLOSED.
ATC magazine door is not closed.
Close ATC magazine door from the maintenance screen before commanding ATC.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

para.text: A-AXIS NOT IN SAFE POSITION FOR ATC OPERATION.
ATC was commanded with AB rotary work head table not at safe position.
A-Axis safe position switch CNC signal PSW06.
B-Axis safe position switch CNC signal PSW07.
Move rotary work head table to safe position before commanding ATC.

para.text: ATC MAGAZINE DOOR IS NOT CLOSED.
ATC magazine door is not closed at start of ATC cycle.
Close ATC magazine door by M555.

para.text: MAINTENANCE MODE IS ACTIVATED OR ATC UNIT IS REMOVED BY PMC PARAMETER.
Maintenance mode is activated or ATC is neglected by parameter.
Maintenance mode is activated MTHIMT=1 in Maintenance Screen or ATC unit is neglected by the PMC parameter: ATCNON[K61.4]=0
If ATC unit is neglected, enable ATC by parameter setting.

para.text: LS601 AND LS602 STATUS INVALID OR SENSOR IS DISABLED BY PARAMETER.
During ATC, LS601 and LS602 status is invalid (abnormal) status.
Check tool seating LS601 and tool detect LS602 status.

Spindle tool clamped status: LS00=1; LS01=0; Sl01=0;

para.text: NEXT TOOL CALL BY T-CODE FAILED.
Calling of next tool has failed, so ATC cannot perform.
The ATC operation instruction was done with T-Code had failed.
Restore the magazine in maintenance mode and command T-Code again.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

para.text: INVALID M6 CONDITION (SPINDLE TOOL IS 0 BUT T0 IS CALLED). IF SPINDLE HAS TOOL WHEN THIS ALARM OCCURS, CHECK THE STATUS OF LS602 (X0010.2).

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:48px left,96px left,144px left,192px left,240px left,288px left,336px left,384px left,432px left,480px left,528px left,576px left ;
para.text: Spindle tool is '0' and program tool is '0'. So cannot find return pot.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:48px left,96px left,144px left,192px left,240px left,288px left,336px left,384px left,432px left,480px left,528px left,576px left ;
para.text: without tool LS602=0; with tool LS602=1;.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Check whether spindle has tool then check LS602 status.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

para.text: INVALID M6 CONDITION (THERE IS TOOL IN SPINDLE BUT SPINDLE TOOL No.= 0). REMOVE THE TOOL FROM THE SPINDLE.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:48px left,96px left,144px left,192px left,240px left,288px left,336px left,384px left,432px left,480px left,528px left,576px left ;
para.text: Spindle tool is '0' and program tool is '0'. So cannot find return pot.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:48px left,96px left,144px left,192px left,240px left,288px left,336px left,384px left,432px left,480px left,528px left,576px left ;
para.text: without tool LS602=0; with tool LS602=1;.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Check whether spindle has tool then check LS602 status.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

para.text: MAGAZINE MOTOR TEMPERATURE EXCEED SETTING VALUE.
Magazine motor temperature exceeded the limit.
Check magazine motor temperature and other mechanism abnormal conditions that cause this error.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: ATLM hit hard over travel limit switch.

Move the axis out of over travel zone in reverse direction and check *BTSOT signal must be ON. Possibly the tool could not detect the measurement mode SKIP signal or tool hit the ATLM sensor in non-measurement mode.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: ROBOT SHUTTER NOT CLOSED. AXIS MOVEMENT INHIBITED.
Robot shutter is not closed. In machine with top shutter or side shutter for workpiece loading the shutter must be closed for feed axis to move.
Close robot shutter at function screen before moving the feed axis.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: COOLANT IS NOT OFF BEFORE PERFORMING ROBOT DOOR OPEN/CLOSE.
Robot door open was commanded with coolant ON.
Correct NC program. Before commanding M81/M82 turn OFF coolant.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: SPINDLE IS NOT STOPPED BEFORE PERFORMING ROBOT DOOR OPEN/CLOSE.
Robot door open was commanded with spindle ON.
Correct NC program. Before commanding M81/M82 turn OFF spindle.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: AXES ARE NOT IN SAFE POSITION BEFORE PERFORMING ROBOT DOOR OPEN/CLOSE.
Robot door open was commanded with axis not in safe position.
Correct NC program. Before commanding M81/M82 ensure axis is in safe position.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: SPLASHGUARD DOOR IS NOT CLOSED BEFORE PERFORMING ROBOT DOOR OPEN/CLOSE.
Robot door close was commanded with splash guard not closed.
Make sure operator door is closed.

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-before:always; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

para.text: ROBOT DOOR OPEN/CLOSE MOTION DID NOT COMPLETE IN SPECIFIED TIME.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:48px left,96px left,144px left,192px left,240px left,288px left,336px left,384px left,432px left,480px left,528px left,576px left ;

para.text: Robot door close status --> SL201=1; SL202=0; LS201=1; LS202=0;

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:48px left,96px left,144px left,192px left,240px left,288px left,336px left,384px left,432px left,480px left,528px left,576px left ;
para.text: Robot door open status --> SL201=0; SL202=1; LS201=0; LS202=1;

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Check solenoid operation and limit switch status.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: During power ON, robot door was neither open nor closed.
Robot door close status --> SL201=1; SL202=0; LS201=1; LS202=0;
Robot door open status --> SL201=0; SL202=1; LS201=0; LS202=1;
Check physical robot door status and check solenoid operation and limit switch status.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: ROBOT DOOR IS NOT IN CORRECT POSITION.PERFORM ROBOT DOOR OPEN/CLOSE USING M-CODE.
Robot door is neither open nor close status. Hence cannot take open or close command from push button.
Robot door close status --> SL201=1; SL202=0; LS201=1; LS202=0;
Robot door open status --> SL201=0; SL202=1; LS201=0; LS202=1;
Perform robot door open or close using M-Code.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: M11 table unclamp was commanded with safety doors not closed.
Standard machine front door close status:
Auto single door: SL1001=OFF; SL1002=ON; LS2311=ON; LS2312=OFF;
Auto double door: SL1001=OFF; SL1002=ON; LS2311=OFF; LS2312=OFF; LS912=ON;
APC machine operator door close status:

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Emergency stop on operator panel is active.
Release emergency stop button and press NC ON [PS1] button.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: EMERGENCY STOP BUTTON PRESSED (LUCC OPERATOR PANEL).
Emergency stop on LUCC operator panel is active.
Release emergency stop button and press NC ON [PS1] button.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: EMERGENCY STOP BUTTON PRESSED (FIXTURE PANEL OR TWO HAND CYCLE START PANEL).
Emergency stop on fixture panel, or two hand cycle start panel is active.
Release emergency stop button and press NC ON [PS1] button.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: EMERGENCY STOP BUTTON PRESSED (STOCKER SIDE PANEL).
Emergency stop on stocker side panel is active.
Release emergency stop button and press NC ON [PS1] button.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: CANNOT USE THIS FUNCTION WHEN AUTO MODE.
Tool call/return function cannot command in auto mode.

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-before:always; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: CANNOT USE THIS FUNCTION WHEN ANOTHER NC PROGRAM RUNNING.
Tool call/return function is commanded when other program has been executed.
Because tool call/return function is a function to be executed by using the CNC program, it is not possible to execute other program.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: CANNOT USE THIS FUNCTION WHEN FEED HOLD CONDITION.
Tool call function is commanded when feed hold condition.
Because tool call/return function is a function to execute by using the CNC program, it is not possible to execute in the feed hold state.
Please remove the cause of the feed hold and instruct again.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Y-AXIS IS IN ATC ZONE.RECOVER Y-AXIS TO (-) DIRECTION BY SLOW JOG.(CONFIRM THE SPINDLE & MAGAZINE POSITION)
The machine coordinates of the Y-Axis are on the plus side (> +0.200) from the stroke end of the machine specification.
Move spindle out of the ATC area in jog feed slowly by pressing OTRS (over ride) switch.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: LS25 WAS NEVER ON DURING THE ATC OPERATION. CHECK THE SENSOR.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

para.text: MOTION OF TOOL PROBE TO CONFIRM THAT NO TOOL EXIST IN GRIPPER FOR RETURN IS NOT COMPLETED WITHIN 10 SECONDS. (RELATED SIGNALS: LS1934,LS1935)CHECK SWITCH, SOLENOID VALVE AND MECHANISM.
The time to confirm that no tool exist in gripper for return is exceed the set time.
Check the signal LS1934 and LS1935.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

para.text: WRITING CNC PARAMETER FOR SHORTCUT MOTION OF ATC BY WINDOW FUNCTION HAS BEEN FAILED.
Writing CNC parameter for the shortcut motion of ATC by the window function has been failed.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

The indexed tool magazine position for the next tool is not equal to the commanded position.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

para.text: MAGAZINE POSITION INDEXED FOR NEXT TOOL IS NOT CORRECT.CHECK MAGAZINE POSITION BY MAINTENANCE SCREEN.
The indexed tool magazine position for returning the tool is not equal to the commanded position.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

para.text: ORDER OF M-CODE FOR ATC MOTION IS ABNORMAL.MACRO PROGRAM:O9020 FOR ATC MAY NOT BE CORRECT.
The order of M-Codes that are used in the macro program for ATC is abnormal.
Check the macro program O9020. Restore the correct macro program.

During tool change deactivate Machine Lock, Z-Axis neglect.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

para.text: POT TO RETURN SPINDLE TOOL IS NOT VACANT.VERIFY THE MAGAZINE POT & SPINDLE POT NUMBER.
Verify spindle tool and spindle tools return pot in magazine in Tool Data Screen.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

para.text: TABLE (B-AXIS) IS NOT CLAMPED, SO CUTTING FEED CAN NOT BE PERFORMED.
Because the index table is not clamping, it is not possible to cut.
Rotary table clamp status --> L153=1; L154=0; SL150=0;

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

para.text: ATC CYCLE WAS INTERRUPTED. RECOVER USING ATC RECOVERY IN MAINTENANCE MODE.
Check at what stage of ATC the interruption occurred. And take remedial action for the fault. Report Makino Service on the observations. Check any related alarm occurs.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

para.text: ATC CYCLE WAS INTERRUPTED DURING SPINDLE TOOL UNCLAMP.
Bring Y-Axis to save pos (Y-150.0 - Y-400.0). Close ATC shutter (M555). Remove any tool from spindle command TX;M6; "X" Refers to tool number During interruption.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

para.text: ATC CYCLE WAS INTERRUPTED DURING SPINDLE TOOL CLAMP.
ATC cycle was interrupted during spindle tool clamp.
Bring Y-Axis to save pos (Y-150.0 - Y-400.0). Close ATC shutter (M555). Remove any tool from spindle. Command TX;M6; "X" refers to tool number during interruption.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

para.text: Tool presence in magazine pot is not updated correctly during spindle unclamp in ATC.
Check tool data integrity on Tool Data Screen. Especially check the pot status of the tool returned to magazine in previous ATC.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

para.text: Tool presence in magazine pot is not updated correctly during spindle clamp in ATC.
Check tool data integrity on Tool Data Screen. Especially check the pot status of the commanded tool in earlier ATC.

para.text: Pot number that commanded to index tool magazine is out of range.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Commanded pot number for indexing must be from 1 to maximum pot number. Maximum pot number ⇒ MGMXPN[D0464]

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Check the parameter D0464 (Maximum pot number)

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

para.text: Tool presence in spindle pot cannot be read correctly.
Check tool data integrity on Tool Data Screen especially check the current spindle pot.
