para.text: ATC RECOVERY COULD NOT BE DONE AS ATC IS NOT WITHIN LIMIT OR INTERRUPTION STATUS NOT MATCHING, RECOVER ATC MANUALLY.
After ATC interruption, ATC Auto recovery was commanded. But machine position is out of ATC zone or some abnormal condition exists. Cannot do auto recovery.
Check actual condition of machine and recover manually.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

para.text: APC RECOVERY COULD NOT BE DONE AS ATC IS NOT WITHIN LIMIT OR INTERRUPTION STATUS NOT MATCHING, RECOVER APC MANUALLY.
After APC interruption, APC Auto recovery was commanded. But machine position is out of ATC zone, or some abnormal condition exists. Cannot do auto recovery.
Check actual condition of machine and recover manually.

para.text: SERVO MOTOR IS SHUT DOWN DUE TO DOOR INTERLOCK.
The servo motor is intercepted for the door interlock.
The front door and the operator door close confirmation signals are lost.
Standard machine front door close status:
Auto single door: SL1001=OFF; SL1002=ON; LS2311=ON; LS2312=OFF;
Auto double door: SL1001=OFF; SL1002=ON; LS2311=OFF; LS2312=OFF; LS912=ON;
APC machine operator door close status:

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

para.text: TSC ENABLE WITH NO TOOL IN SPINDLE.
Load TSC tool in the spindle when execute TSC.

Refer PMM manual for error on PMM screen and on

CNC alarm related with tool magazine PMC axis control has occurred.
The alarm of the magazine servo axis control has occurred from the CNC side. (EIALA is ON.)
Check message at CNC side screen.

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: CONDITION TO ALLOW MAGAZINE MOTION IS NOT SATISFIED.
Tool magazine cannot move. Conditions are operator door is not closed.
Standard machine front door close status:
Auto single door: SL1001=OFF; SL1002=ON; LS2311=ON; LS2312=OFF;
Auto double door: SL1001=OFF; SL1002=ON; LS2311=OFF; LS2312=OFF; LS912=ON;
APC machine operator door close status:
Confirm the condition that the tool magazine can be started.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: INDEXING MOTION OF MAGAZINE DID NOT COMPLETED WITHIN THE TIME.
Indexing motion of tool magazine does not complete within the time. (30sec)
The sequence of the ATC magazine did not complete in normal operation time.
Check parameter related to tool magazine servo axis.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: MODE SELECTOR IS NOT "AUTO" OR NC MODE IS NOT "MEMORY" MODE. AUTO START INHIBITED.
Change the NC mode to “MEMORY” mode when execute auto start process.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Either of the Two hand button are tied.
Two hand push button signals --> Left side: THPBL; Right side: THPBR; When not pressed these signals should be '0'.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: A-Axis lost unclamping condition during movement.
Pneumatic unclamping mechanism signal status – L151=0; L152=1;
Hydraulic unclamping mechanism signal status - Single acting type PS2603=0; Double acting type PS2603=0;PS2604=1;
Confirm poor adjustment or failure of pressure switch. Or failure of table clamping mechanism.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: A-AXIS CLAMPING IS NOT COMPLETED WITHIN TIME.
A-Axis clamping not complete even after 5sec has elapsed.
Pneumatic clamping mechanism signal status – L151=1; L152=0;
Hydraulic clamping mechanism signal status - Single acting type PS2603=1; Double acting type PS2603=1;PS2604=0;
Confirm poor adjustment or failure of pressure switch. Or failure of table clamping mechanism.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: A-AXIS IS NOT UNCLAMPED. USE M11 TO UNCLAMP.
A-Axis table was commanded without unclamping the table.
Unclamp the table by M11 and then command A-Axis movement.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: A-AXIS UNCLAMPING IS NOT COMPLETED WITHIN TIME.
A-Axis unclamping not complete even after 5sec has elapsed.
Pneumatic unclamping mechanism signal status – L151=0; L152=1;
Hydraulic unclamping mechanism signal status - Single acting type PS2603=0; Double acting type PS2603=0;PS2604=1;
Confirm poor adjustment or failure of pressure switch. Or failure of table clamping mechanism.

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-before:always; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: A-AXIS INTERLOCK BY FIXTURE.CLAMP FIXTURE TO ROTATE A-AXIS.
A-Axis rotation interlocked by fixture status.
Clamp the fixture before rotating A-Axis table.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: A-AXIS INTERLOCK BY TOOL POSITION. MOVE AXIS TO SAFE POSITION TO ROTATE A-AXIS.
A-Axis table rotation commanded without Z-Axis in safe position.
Move Z-Axis to home before rotating A-Axis.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: A-AXIS ON STOCKER SIDE, CANNOT COMMAND ROTATION.
On APC machine, stocker side table rotation was commanded. Stocker side table rotation not possible.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:48px left,96px left,144px left,192px left,240px left,288px left,336px left,384px left,432px left,480px left,528px left,576px left ;
para.text: A-AXIS INTERLOCK BY FIXTURE CLAMP POSITION.RESTORE FIXTURE CLAMP TO ROTATE A-AXIS.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:48px left,96px left,144px left,192px left,240px left,288px left,336px left,384px left,432px left,480px left,528px left,576px left ;
para.text: A-Axis rotation interlocked by fixture status.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Clamp the fixture before rotating A-Axis table.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: MAINTENANCE MODE IS ACTIVATED, SO PALLET CHANGING IS IMPOSSIBLE.
Pallet change is commanded when the maintenance mode is active.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: ATC IS NOT STAND-BY STATUS, SO PALLET CHANGING IS IMPOSSIBLE.
Pallet change commanded with ATC not in standby (ready)
Feed axis must not be in ATC zone (Y-Axis machine position must be > -150.0)
ATC shutter must be closed. (ATC magazine position should be 0 Degree)
Confirm ATC standby before commanding pallet changer.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: B-AXIS IS NOT AT POSITION THAT PERMIT PALLET CHANGING.
Pallet change is commanded when table is not at home position.
Confirm table home position before commanding pallet changer.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: NOZZLE OR THROUGH SPINDLE COOLANT IS WORKING, SO PALLET CHANGING IS IMPOSSIBLE.
Pallet change is commanded when coolant system is active. Some coolant is active.
Stop the coolant(s). Coolant pause is not coolant stop.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: PALLET CLAMP/UNCLAMP MOTION IS NOT COMPLETED IN SPECIFIED TIME.
The pallet clamp/unclamp motion is not completed within the specified time. (5sec)
This may indicate a breakdown of the pallet clamp/unclamp mechanism. Check unit conditions and switch.

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-before:always; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

table.style: width:auto; cell-padding:4px; cell-spacing:0px; page-break-inside:auto; border-width:0px; border-spacing:0px; border-collapse:collapse; cell-border-width:1px; border-color:#000000; border-style:solid; background-color:none; head-row-background-color:none; alt-row-background-color:none;

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: APC ARM TURN MOTION IS NOT COMPLETED IN SPECIFIED TIME.
The pallet changer arm turn motion is not completed within the specified time.
Arm CCW: LS102=1, LS103=0, SL101A=1, SL101B=0
This may indicate a breakdown of the arm turning mechanism. Check unit conditions and switch.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: APC ARM IS NOT AT ENDS OF CW/CCW.
The pallet changer arm is not home position. Pallet changer axis position is not CW or CCW. So pallet up/down is inhibited.
Arm CCW: LS102=1, LS103=0, SL101A=1, SL101B=0
Return the arm to home position in the maintenance mode.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: APC ARM DOWN/LIFT MOTION IS NOT COMPLETED IN SPECIFIED TIME.
The up/down motion of the pallet changer arm is not completed within the specified time. (10sec)
Arm down: SL100A=1, SL100B=0, LS100=1, LS101=0
This may indicate a breakdown of the arm up/down mechanism. Check unit conditions and switch.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: APC ARM IS NOT AT DOWN POSITION.
Pallet changer is commanded with arm not down.
Arm down: SL100A=1, SL100B=0, LS100=1, LS101=0
Return the arm to down position in maintenance mode.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: APC ARM IS NOT AT LIFT POSITION.
Pallet changer is commanded when arm is not lifted.
Arm lift: SL100A=0, SL100B=1, LS100=0, LS101=1
Return the arm to the standby position in the maintenance mode.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Axis is locked by machine lock or Z-axis lock in function screen.
Remove the machine lock or Z-lock before commanding the APC.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:48px left,96px left,144px left,192px left,240px left,288px left,336px left,384px left,432px left,480px left,528px left,576px left ;
para.text: Y-AXIS AND Z-AXIS IS NOT AT REFERENCE POINT,SO PALLET CHANGING IS IMPOSSIBLE.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:48px left,96px left,144px left,192px left,240px left,288px left,336px left,384px left,432px left,480px left,528px left,576px left ;
para.text: Pallet changer cannot be operated, because X-Axis, Y-Axis or Z-Axis is not at the pallet change position.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:48px left,96px left,144px left,192px left,240px left,288px left,336px left,384px left,432px left,480px left,528px left,576px left ;

para.text: Move axis to pallet change position.

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-before:always; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: BOTH LIMIT SWITCHES OF APC-ARM LIFT/DOWN WERE TURNED ON AT THE SAME TIME.
Pallet changer arm up/down switches both turn on at the same time.
Error condition: LS100 LS101 both are ON at same time.
This may indicate a breakdown of the arm up/down switch. Check the switches.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Pallet changer cannot be operated, because the pallet is not clamped.
Pallet clamping status: SL151=0, LS55=1, LS56=1
Clamp the pallet in the maintenance mode.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Pallet changer cannot be operated, because operator door is not closed.
Standard machine front door close status:
Auto single door: SL1001=OFF; SL1002=ON; LS2311=ON; LS2312=OFF;
Auto double door: SL1001=OFF; SL1002=ON; LS2311=OFF; LS2312=OFF; LS912=ON;
APC machine operator door + front door must be close status:
Front auto door: LS2312L=OFF; LS2312R=OFF; LS966=ON; SL1002=ON; SL1001=OFF; or Front manual door: LS966=ON;

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Pallet changer cannot be operated, because front door is open.
Standard machine front door close status:
Auto single door: SL1001=OFF; SL1002=ON; LS2311=ON; LS2312=OFF;
Auto double door: SL1001=OFF; SL1002=ON; LS2311=OFF; LS2312=OFF; LS912=ON;
APC machine operator door + front door must be close status:
Front auto door: LS2312L=OFF; LS2312R=OFF; LS966=ON; SL1002=ON; SL1001=OFF; or Front manual door: LS966=ON;

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Pallet seating check sensor does not turn OFF though the pallet changer is operated.
Pallet seating check sensor: LS112 must be OFF during pallet operation.
Check pallet seating check sensor and pneumatic circuit.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: PALLET SEATING CHECK SWITCH (LS112) DOES NOT TURN ON IN SPECIFIED TIME.
Pallet seating check sensor does not turn on though the pallet is clamped.
Cutting chip etc. might have been caught between the pallet and the pallet cone.
Clean the pallet and the pallet cone, and try again.
If this message appears again, the adjustment of this sensor may be required.

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-before:always; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

table.style: width:auto; cell-padding:4px; cell-spacing:0px; page-break-inside:auto; border-width:0px; border-spacing:0px; border-collapse:collapse; cell-border-width:1px; border-color:#000000; border-style:solid; background-color:none; head-row-background-color:none; alt-row-background-color:none;

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: BOTH LIMIT SWITCHES OF APC-ARM CW/CCW WERE TURNED ON AT THE SAME TIME.
Two turn end switches of the pallet changer arm were turned on at the same time.
Error Condition: LS102, LS103 both are ON at the same time.
There may be a breakdown either of the arm end detection switch.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: CNC WAS RESET WHEN M60 COMMAND WAS WAITING FOR COMPLETION.
NC reset was pressed during APC.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: ATC DOOR NOT CLOSED OR ATC NOT IN STANDBY. PALLET CHANGE INHIBIT.
Pallet change commanded with ATC not standby or ATC shutter not closed.
Feed axis must not be in ATC zone (Y-Axis machine position must be > -150.0)
ATC shutter must be closed. (ATC magazine position should be 0 Degree)

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:48px left,96px left,144px left,192px left,240px left,288px left,336px left,384px left,432px left,480px left,528px left,576px left ;
para.text: TAP RETRACT POSSIBLE ONLY IN MDI MODE.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:48px left,96px left,144px left,192px left,240px left,288px left,336px left,384px left,432px left,480px left,528px left,576px left ;
para.text: Tap retract commanded other then in MDI mode.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Perform tap retract in MDI mode.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Z-AXIS NOT AT HOME POSITION. CANNOT REFERENCE X AND Y- AXIS.
Reference X and Y-Axis after confirming Z-Axis is at home position.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: APC OPERATION INTERRUPTED. RECOVER APC STANDBY USING MAINTENANCE MODE.
Recover APC to standby (ready condition) in maintenance mode.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: APC OPERATION INTERRUPTED AS OPERATOR DOOR IS OPENED.
APC machine operator door + front door must be close status:
Front auto door: LS2312L=OFF; LS2312R=OFF; LS966=ON; SL1002=ON; SL1001=OFF; or Front manual door: LS966=ON;
Recover APC to standby (ready condition) in maintenance mode.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: APC OPERATION INTERRUPTED AS STOCKER LIGHT CURTAIN SENSOR IS OFF.
Light curtain sensor status: Not interrupted LS2315=1; Interrupted LS2315=0;
Recover APC to standby (ready condition) in maintenance mode.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: ROTARY AXIS(A/B) NOT AT HOME POSITION, SO PALLET CHANGE IS IMPOSSIBLE.
Pallet commanded with AB table not at home position.
AB table home position signal status.
Before pallet operation confirm AB table is at home position.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: STOCKER DOOR NOT CLOSED OR LIGHT CURTAIN IS OFF. PALLET READY INHIBIT.
M69 or pallet ready button commanded with safety door not closed.
Safety door close status: operator door LS912=1 + front door LS966=1 or light curtain LS2315=1.
Confirm door close before commanding M69 or Pallet ready button.

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-before:always; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

table.style: width:auto; cell-padding:4px; cell-spacing:0px; page-break-inside:auto; border-width:0px; border-spacing:0px; border-collapse:collapse; cell-border-width:1px; border-color:#000000; border-style:solid; background-color:none; head-row-background-color:none; alt-row-background-color:none;

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: B-Axis lost unclamping condition during movement.
Unclamping mechanism signal status - SL151=1; L153=0; L154=1;
Confirm poor adjustment or failure of pressure switch. Or failure of table clamping mechanism.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: B-AXIS CLAMPING IS NOT COMPLETED WITHIN TIME.
B-Axis clamp status SL151=0; L153=1; L154=0;
Confirm poor adjustment or failure of pressure switch. Or failure of table clamping mechanism.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: B-AXIS IS NOT UNCLAMPED. USE M13 TO UNCLAMP.
B-Axis table movement commanded without table unclamp condition.
Unclamp table by M13 before movement command.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: B-AXIS UNCLAMPING IS NOT COMPLETED WITHIN TIME.
B-Axis unclamping not completed within specified time (5sec).
Unclamping mechanism signal status - SL151=1; L153=0; L154=1;
Confirm poor adjustment or failure of pressure switch. Or failure of table clamping mechanism.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: B-AXIS INTERLOCK BY FIXTURE.CLAMP FIXTURE TO ROTATE B-AXIS.
B-Axis rotation interlocked by fixture status.
Clamp fixture before rotating B-Axis table.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: B-AXIS INTERLOCK BY Z-AXIS POSITION. MOVE Z-AXIS TO HOME POSITION.
B-Axis table rotation commanded without Z-Axis in safe position.
Move Z-Axis to home before rotating B-Axis.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: B-AXIS ON STOCKER SIDE, CANNOT COMMAND ROTATION.
On APC machine, stocker side table rotation was commanded. Stocker side table rotation not possible.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: LUCC OVERLOAD (LS1306) OR CONVEYOR MOTOR THERMAL TRIP (TH6).
LUCC motor thermal TH6 must be '0'.
Remove the cause of the trip and reset the thermal switch.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: LIFT-UP CHIP CONVEYER OVERLOAD.CHECK LIMIT SWITCH "LS1306" ON LUCC.REMOVE OVERLOAD BY USING MANUAL MODE.
LUCC overload check limit switch LS1306 must be '1',
Remove the overload by moving conveyor in reverse direction in manual mode and reset the alarm.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: PART IS NOT CLAMPED, SO SPINDLE CAN NOT BE STARTED.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: LIFT-UP CHIP CONVEYER MOTOR THERMAL TRIP.RESET TH6 IN LUCC CONTROL BOX.
LUCC motor thermal TH6 must be '0'.
Remove the cause of the trip and reset the thermal switch.

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-before:always; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
